attributes.additional_details:
The universal job match (direct gov website) is shameful the links dont work correctly, to log in you have to visit a page which wont let you leave, you cant log on to the actual website as it just refreshes asif you havent put your account information into the feild its rather frustrating.

I am 17 years old and finding a job is difficult in todays climate, any help is fantastic but this website is more of a hinderance than a help, showing me all these jobs that i am not able to apply for its a little unfair.

Whoever deals with the website should be ashamed its appauling, It should have been dealt with when many people who use it complained.

Thankyou
Yours sincerely Jay Wright.
